item.title: Kenya issues arrest warrant for British national over young mother's murder
item.description: The 21-year-old was killed in 2012 and her body found in a septic tank in the garrison town of Nanyuki.

item.title: Justin Bieber and Sabrina Carpenter to headline Coachella 2026
item.description: Karol G will also top the bill at the festival held in the Californian desert.

item.title: Artefacts recovered from Titanic's sunk sister ship
item.description: Items retrieved from the wreck of HMHS Britannic in the Aegean include a bell and binoculars, Greece says.

item.title: Google owner reveals Â£5bn AI investment in UK ahead of Trump visit
item.description: Google's president and chief investment officer Ruth Porat tells the BBC there are "profound opportunities in the UK".

item.title: Israel has committed genocide in Gaza, UN commission of inquiry says
item.description: The panel finds that four of the five genocidal acts defined under international law have been carried out against Palestinians during the war.
